document.full_text: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said on saturday that the country's economic outlook was very severe and that the central bank would take appropriate action to support the economy.
document.title: boj shirakawa warns japan economic outlook "very severe"
lines_and_colors: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa said on saturday that the country's economic outlook was very severe and that the central bank would take appropriate action to support the economy.
